channel.title: Experienced Server Operator: PLEASE HELP
channel.description: I recently started a new server, and now I need assistance in opening the proper ports to allow others onto it. I have a Linksys router, and have tried going onto my router's ip and changing port forwarding so that port range 4000-5000 was open, but pple still can't get on. Anyone who can assist me and get it going can immediately have Admin status. If needed, reach me thru AIM. My s/n is Ub3r Hax3r. Thank you.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2007, 05:56:22 PM[/size][hr]bump[br][size=1]Posted on: January 17, 2007, 06:21:22 PM[/size][hr]bump

item.title: Experienced Server Operator: PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @jehanne jehanne
item.description:
@jehanne wrote:

depends on what port you want to use. if our port is between 4000 and 5000 your ok, but if you have 43594, thats ABOVE 5000. same for 5555.

Read full topic

item.title: Experienced Server Operator: PLEASE HELP
item.dc:creator: @Hydronix Hydronix
item.description:
@Hydronix wrote:

I recently started a new server, and now I need assistance in opening the proper ports to allow others onto it. I have a Linksys router, and have tried going onto my router’s ip and changing port forwarding so that port range 4000-5000 was open, but pple still can’t get on. Anyone who can assist me and get it going can immediately have Admin status. If needed, reach me thru AIM. My s/n is Ub3r Hax3r.
